data.text: @DurhamHealth @DFisman @bigtmac19 @nilikm Wow, did you read the comment thread? We all isolated. The issue is that there is no way to report positive cases and DRHD is  publishing a false narrative with your Covid tracker when you refuse to allow us to report. Willful ignorance is not health care!
@IWasInTheMiddle @DFisman @bigtmac19 @nilikm Hi - Please see our "I received a positive test result" section on our COVID-19 Information Hub: https://t.co/gBD4GS7kUY Thanks

@DFisman @nilikm Another step to improve the awareness of tuberculosis diagnosis and reduce the chances of TB transmission.
Our recent article based on TB detection through biosensor is published in 'Critical Reviews in Microbiology'.
https://t.co/6ZhHc3E8CE
#StopTB
@without_on @DFisman @nilikm It’s because somehow it magically went away when they stopped testing.
@DFisman @nilikm No thank you! HPPA WHO and More as done enough! Good day

@DFisman @nilikm .
Says the guy that is not a health care worker. This is stupid advice. It will just waste people's time, important time spent elsewhere.

Hack!
.
